str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
This; he, she, it.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
(a) of noble birth, of high birth, (b) noble in nature. From eu and ginomai; well born, i.e. high in rank, or generous.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From Thessalos and nike; Thessalonice, a place in Asia Minor.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Whosoever, whichsoever, whatsoever.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To take, receive, accept, welcome. Middle voice of a primary verb; to receive.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
Inclination, readiness, eagerness, willingness, promptness. From prothumos; predisposition, i.e. Alacrity.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From ana and krino; properly, to scrutinize, i.e. investigate, interrogate, determine.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) a writing, (b) a passage of scripture; plur: the scriptures. A document, i.e. Holy Writ.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
This; he, she, it.

parse: Verb - Present Optative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
